rules_text:
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
Cycling {5}{R}{W}{B} [i]({5}{R}{W}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)[/i]
When you cycle this card, destroy up to two target creatures and/or planeswalkers.
notes:
ARTed

Rank_4.5
The base rate of two mana murder is very strong and very cheap, the cycling rate is deceptively strong BUT very expensive
Mostly an aesthetic/design question here cause it reads weirdly with that contrast
